info.name: Simplenote Minimalismo
info.description: Simplenote Minimalismo makes it nicer to use Simplenote by removing distractions and providing a cleaner appearance.
info.additionalInfo:
Features
  • A simpler and cleaner appearance.
  • Top navigation and notes list are hidden but reappear when you hover your mouse over them.
  • Centered text area.
  • Removed footer.
  • Minimal scrollbar (Chrome only).
Version history
  • v1.1 (March 27, 2016) - Fixed bug with footer hiding.
  • v1.0 (March 26, 2016) - Initial release.
